nature_language: [当前位置苏州,目标位置南京,旅行人数2,旅行天数2] 我和男朋友两个人在苏州读书，想要趁周末在去南京看看江南水乡的风景，有什么值得推荐的景点吗？
nature_language_en: [Current location: Suzhou, Destination: Nanjing, Number of travelers: 2, Number of travel days: 2] My boyfriend and I are studying in Suzhou and want to take advantage of the weekend to visit Nanjing and see the scenery of the Jiangnan water towns. Are there any attractions you would recommend?
